alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:17AM MDT until May 30 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... Hamlin County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 216 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Albert, or 11 miles southwest of Estelline, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Poinsett and Lake Albert around 220 AM CDT. Lake Norden and Stone Bridge around 225 AM CDT. Hayti and Dempster around 230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Castlewood, Claremont Colony, Thomas, Pelican Lake, Kranzburg and Watertown City Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
